operation.command: update BGEN.CIVILP set ETARAD = 'D', ETADDC = 20191231 where ETACAF = '02018000007994'
select 1 from sgengpp.gpp_personne_physique p where p.numero_interne = 2018000007994 and p.date_deces = '2019-12-31' and p.radie = true and p.decede = true and p.motif_radiation = 'DECEDE'
update BGEN.CIVILP set ETARAD = ' ', ETADDC = 0 where ETACAF = '02018000007994'
